verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, for <S%H2403>sin<s%> and for <S%H5079>uncleanness<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H6091>idols<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and they shall no more be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>; and also I will cause the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and the <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H376>that<s%>, when any shall yet <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, then his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>begat<s%> him shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H2421>him<s%>, Thou shalt not live; for thou <S%H1696>speakest<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>begat<s%> him shall <S%H1856>thrust<s%> him through when he <S%H5012>prophesieth<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H2384>vision<s%>, when he <S%H5012>prophesieth<s%>; neither shall they <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H155>mantle<s%> to <S%H3584>deceive<s%>:
but he shall <S%H559>say<s%>, I am no <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, I am a <S%H5647>tiller<s%> of the <S%H120>ground<s%>; for I have been made a <S%H7069>bondman<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

And one shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H4347>him<s%>, What are these wounds between thine <S%H3027>arms<s%>? Then he shall <S%H559>answer<s%>, Those with which I was <S%H5221>wounded<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H157>friends<s%>.

Awake <S%H5782><s%>, O <S%H2719>sword<s%>, against my <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, and against the <S%H1397>man<s%> that is my <S%H5997>fellow<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> shall be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>; and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the little <S%H6819>ones<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H776>pass<s%>, that in all the land, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6310>parts<s%> therein shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> and <S%H1478>die<s%>; but the <S%H7992>third<s%> shall be left <S%H3498>therein<s%>.

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the third <S%H7992>part<s%> into the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and will <S%H6884>refine<s%> them as <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H6884>refined<s%>, and will <S%H974>try<s%> them as <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H974>tried<s%>. They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> on my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and I will <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>: I will say, It is my <S%H5971>people<s%>; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is my <S%H430>God<s%>.
